website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Aspire A5600U-UB13 is a nice looking all-in-one desktop PC with a solid feature set and acceptable, though not exceptional performance. It's a decent all-in-one desktop at a decent price, but there are better systems out there for not much more money.
cons: Slower performance than other midrange AiO desktops

customer_reviews.title: Windows 8 - not good at all.
customer_reviews.text: I am torn in giving this product only 3 stars. Hardware is good, but Windows 8 is causing problem, the routine Windows updates always failed. Microsoft support suggested (it was a free support, but that the only good thing about the support - it's free, but that's all it is) and guided me to upgrade to Windows 8.1, as a results youtube video become choppy and bluetooth stop recognizing devices. So I was not able to give more than 3 stars for this product.
customer_reviews.author: EVA

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a year now and I can say this cp is really good it handles my gaming My music and files some games need to be run at a lower resolution suchas gta 4 but u won't be running gta 5 on here most games can run tho if ur not sure download can my pc run it it will let you know what games u can run
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: great for watching Netflex
customer_reviews.text: The screen is large enough to serve s a flat screen TV, great for watching Netflex. I like the hand screen touch, too.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: After just a year and very little use the graphic ...
customer_reviews.text: After just a year and very little use the graphic card and mother board went. It can not be repaired. I can not get any reply from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic computer
customer_reviews.text: Give it 5 stars for ease of setup. Takes getting use to windows 8 but after that this computer is really fast. Love the look and feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony zummo

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! Best all n one computer I have ever bought, hope I dont ever have to buy one again.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Computer screen had an internal defect (approx. 1inch in length). Possibly damaged pixels
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Mavraidis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great balance of performance and functionality. The windows 8 leaves much to be desired. Hard to tell that I'm watching netflicks on a computer. It has all the bells and whistles I am looking for in a home computer.
customer_reviews.author: James Ervin

customer_reviews.title: slowwwwww
customer_reviews.text: some reviews try to say its windows 8 all I know is that this acer is slowwwww wish I had purchased another brand
customer_reviews.author: FLATLINE

customer_reviews.title: Acer desktop
customer_reviews.text: After learning how to use it, it works fine. Every day I use it i'm learning more. I also love how it looks on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hochberg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at best buy and I love it! This thing is truly an all in one system! Pros: super quiet, responsive, up to 10 finger touch screen, built in DVD, microphone, camera, stylish and sleek, low profile, wireless keyboard and mouse, 1tb hard drive, loud speakers, and a very beautiful screen that's sharp and clear! Cons: it's running Windows 8.1 =( though I have a reservation for windows 10 so I'm just waiting for the free upgrade once it comes out =) This pc was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: SelflessHERO

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because the back would not open.. it could not stand on it own.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a good buy for the price if you dont want to build one yourself
customer_reviews.author: Nana G

customer_reviews.title: Great computer! Windows 8 needs a doctor, BIG TIME!
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself is lovely. Love the touchscreen. Windows 8, on the other hand, is something to get used to. I would love it too if I wouldn't be having all these issues with bugs and failing updates...
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short and simple...the performance of this pc is fine....UNTIL it comes crashing down. I'm not sure who thought up the kickstand design, but it managed to NOT fall for 6 months until my son BARELY stepped on an attached speaker cord. The entire unit went flying off the desk and now we're stuck with a $1000 doorstop, as I'm sure a screen repair would be half the cost of the unit. If you buy it, stop at babies r us and get a dresser wall mount to attach to the back so it won't take a dive.
customer_reviews.author: mrnick

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire A5600U-UR11 23-Inch All-in-One Touchscreen Desktop (Black)
product_meta.description:
Acer Aspire A5600U-UR11 All-in-One Touch Desktop PC comes with these specs: 3rd Generation Intel Core i3-3120M Processor, Windows 8, Intel HM77 Express Chipset, 23-Inch Full HD Widescreen Edge-to-Edge LED Back-lit Touch Screen (10-point multi-touch), 8192MB DDR3 Memory, Intel HD Graphics, 1TB 5400 RPM SATA Hard Drive , 8X DVD-SuperMulti Double-Layer Drive, Multi-in-1 Digital Media Card Reader, Built-in 2.0MP Webcam and Microphone, 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11a/b/g/n Wireless, Bluetooth 4.0+HS, Virtual surround speakers by CONEQ sound technology from Real Sound Lab, 2 - USB 3.0 Ports, 3 - USB 2.0 Ports, HDMI-In Port, HDMI-Out Port, Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, 15.8 lbs. | 7.17 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support, Registration/ Limited Warranty Card, McAfee Internet Security Suite (60-day trial)

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Intel Core i3-3120M 2.5 GHz (3 MB Cache)
